desc.p: This field holds the special spread rate along with customer spread .
This field holds the end Date till which interest calculation will take place for PIK interest
This is the effective date of the interest rate updated in the associated INT.RATE field
This field holds the customer spread used to arrive at the effective interest rate to calculate interest
This field holds the special cap spread rate for special spread.
This field holds the tax amount calculated on the total interest amount

This field captures the differential interest amount due to rate change and maturity date changes. This amount is expressed in the loan currency. It is a multivalue field associated to RET.AC.OR.PL and RET.INT.DATE.
This field will hold the Periodic Automatic(Libor) interest amount for the loans contract during the interest rate type change .
This field holds the total interest amount calculated based on the balance. The rate is available in the field INT.RATE and period is takenfrom the fields STRT.PRD.INT and END.PRD.INT

This field is updated with the participant's share of the movement amount whenever there is a movement with effective date updated in PR.AMT.EFF.DATE field
This field records the positive movement of the loan for participants
This field holds the start date for PIK interest calculation.
This field is updated with the movement type of the transactions. Currently, this field is updated with BS to indicate the BUY/SELL transaction
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
olds the interest amount calculated on the online partial repayment amount for the current period.
This is the effective date on which the differential interest is returned. This is a multivalue field associated to the fields RET.INT.AMT and RET.AC.OR.PL
Indicates the current calculation method for interest computation purposes, defaulted from SL.LOANS record.
This field holds the date from which the associated total interest amount calculation begins
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This field holds the outstanding accrual amount calculated on the balance amount
This field holds the end date for the associated total interest amount calculation
The effective date for the outstanding balance and movement amount is updated in this filed. This is a mulivalue field and associated with the fields PR.OUTS.AMT and PR.AMT.MOVED
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This field will hold the Floating(Prime) interest amount for the Loans contract during the interest type change.
This field is updated with the participant's share of the initial loan amount
This field holds the PIK interest amount that will be capitalised for the current interest frequency.
This field holds the PIK Rate defined for the Contract
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This field is updated with the movement amount of the corresponding movement defined in MVT.TYPE field
This field holds the capitalisation spread rate for customer spread

Currency of the loan contract is updated in this field
Holds the share of the participant in the current outstanding loan amount
This field holds the rate at which the total interest amount is calculated. A multivalue field associated with the effective date field RATE.EFF.DT.

This field indicates whether the differential interest is posted to P&L or returned to customer. When the differential interest is returned to customer, this field is updated as AC-interest liq account. If it is posted to P&L, this field is updated with PL-accrual category
This field holds the PIK interest calculated for the current interest schedule of loan contract.
This field records the negative movement of the loan for participants
This field captures the interest amount movement between participants. This amount will be considered on schedule date. This forms part of the interest details set of associated multivalue fields
This field holds the capitalised amount for each interest period .
This field holds the rate at which Capitalisation takes place.
This is the key field to this file and holds the SL.LOAN contract ID appended with the participant ID for whom this balance record is created
